species.name: klawf
descriptions: Klawf hangs upside-down from cliffs, waiting for prey. But Klawf can’t remain in this position for long because its blood rushes to its head.
This Pokémon lives on sheer cliffs. It sidesteps opponents’ attacks, then lunges for their weak spots with its claws.

abilities.name: regenerator
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon switching out.
